meanings.sent1: The town was wary of the caitiffs who roamed the streets at night.
meanings.sent2: The community shunned the caitiffs for their dishonest ways.
meanings.sent3: The caitiffs tried to trick the villagers, but their plan backfired.
meanings.sent4: The caitiffs' true colors were revealed when they betrayed their own friends.
meanings.sent5: The caitiffs' presence cast a shadow of fear over the peaceful town.

meanings.sent1: The caitiffs fled at the first sign of trouble, leaving their companions behind.
meanings.sent2: The caitiffs whispered lies behind closed doors, hoping to cause discord.
meanings.sent3: The caitiffs trembled in fear as the brave hero approached.
meanings.sent4: The caitiffs' actions spoke louder than their empty words.
meanings.sent5: The caitiffs' cowardice was evident in their refusal to stand up for what was right.
